title: Ragtag at 9th Street Vid
content:
Now available for your home-viewing pleasure: 
 
Far from the Madding Crowd 
 
Two Days, One Night 
 
Citizenfour 
 
I'll See You in My Dreams 
 
Love & Mercy 
 
The Jinx (T/F) 
 
We didn't show 'em, but you might like: 
 
White God 
 
Jauja 
 
The 100-Year-Old Man ... 
 
Mad Max: Fury Road 
 
Good Kill 
 
Furious Seven 
 
The Overnight 
 

 
The Overnight.
